io.klerch.alexa.tellask.schema.annotation

Annotation Type AlexaSlotSave


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface AlexaSlotSave
    An annotation for fields in either an AlexaIntentModel or AlexaStateModel. Fields having this annotation will have their value used for resolving slots (placeholders) in the utterances.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String slotName
      Name of the slot (placeholder) in the utterance where the value of this field should go into.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      AlexaOutputFormat formatAs
      The format to apply when putting the field's value into the slot (placeholder) of an utterance.

    • Element Detail

      • slotName

        public abstract String slotName
        Name of the slot (placeholder) in the utterance where the value of this field should go into.
        Returns:
        the slot name

      • formatAs

        public abstract AlexaOutputFormat formatAs
        The format to apply when putting the field's value into the slot (placeholder) of an utterance. Most likely this format has an SSML tag which is wrapped around the value of this field
        Returns:
        the format to apply when putting the field's value into the slot of an utterance.
        Default:
        io.klerch.alexa.tellask.schema.type.AlexaOutputFormat.TEXT
